ValueSet-CDHIv1.title: Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1 Schema
ValueSet-CDHIv1.description: JSON Schema for Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1 ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-CDHIv1.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1 ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/base/ValueSet-CDHIv1.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
